歂字的基本解释

歂
chuǎn
古同“喘”，急促地呼吸。

歂
chuán
姓。

歂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuǎn］
［《廣韻》市兖切，上獮，禪。］
［《集韻》尺兖切，上獮，昌。］
同“喘1”。
[②]［chuán］
［《廣韻》市緣切，平仙，禪。］
姓。《左传·庄公十一年》有“歂孫”。《汉书·古今人表》作“顓孫”。

歂字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【欠字部】　歂； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页570第01
【唐韻】市緣切【集韻】淳沿切，?音遄。【說文】口氣引也。　又姓。【左傳】有歂孫。【史記】有歂師。　又【廣韻】市兗切【集韻】豎兗切，?音腨。義同。　又【集韻】尺兗切，音舛。與喘同。【說文】疾息也。

歂字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
歂字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuǎn］
["Guangyun" City Yanqie, Shangzheng, Zen. ]
["Ji Yun" Chi Yan cuts, upright, prosperous. ]
Same as "Asthma 1".
[②] [chuán]
["Guangyun" City Yuanqi, Pingxian, Zen. ]
name. "The Eleventh Year of Zuo Zhuan · Zhuang Gong" has "saving grandchildren". "Han Shu · Ancient and Modern People's Table" as "Zhuan Sun".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Own Words] 　歂; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 570 01
【Tang Yun】City edge cut 【Ji Yun】Chun along the cut, sound trance. [Said the text] The tone is also quoted.　Another last name. [Zuo Zhuan] There are grandchildren. [Historical Records] There are saving teachers.　[Guangyun] City Yanqie [Jiyun] Vertical Yanqie,? Sound 腨. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The ruler cuts, and the sound. The same with asthma. 【Said the text】I'm sick.
